name: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
description: Experience superior sound quality with Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation). Featuring next-level Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Transparency, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking for an immersive listening experience.
features: Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation
Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking
Up to 6 hours listening time (30 hours with case)
Touch control for music, calls & Siri
